name: Beastmaster's Trance
summary: You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses.
description:
You can enter a trance that allows you to briefly inhabit the body of one of your animal companions and share its senses. You gain the focus spell beastmaster trance. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
